name: Into the Horizon
description:
This game is an endless runner project developed for CS4423.

CLICK FULLSCREEN BUTTON WHEN PLAYING

CONTROLS ================

- A,D (left and right)

- Space, Down Key (jump, fall)

- Play/Pause button (should be pretty straightforward)

FEATURES =================

- Yellow Coin (+20 health up to 100%)

- Blue Coin (10 seconds of invincibility)

- Red Coin (10 seconds of half speed)

- Random number of obstacles on platforms

- Platforms spawn at varying distances

FUTURE UPDATES ===========

- Eventually plan to add a 3d player model, along with several animations to modernize the game

- Add more level designs and new platform types
